nodes.text: AT-AT 36 was the designation of an All Terrain Armored Transport that was deployed on the city of Jalath on the planet Lothal. There, along with another walker, it was assigned to provide security for a convoy of three Sphyrna-class Hammerhead corvettes and prevent them from falling into rebel hands. While participating in a battle against Phoenix Cell, AT-AT 36 was damaged and toppled by a corvette that was under rebel control.
